title: Skarner's Spires don't appear on Ascension
body:
I just played a game as Skarner in Ascension and his spires weren't on the map. They did appear on the last gamemode rotation, why is it different now? Would it be a bug? Or if it's a nerf to Ascension Skarner, at least compensate for that with a buff of some sort.

{{champion:72}} The Crystal Scar is weeping {{champion:72}}

replies.body: Its ironic because its his home map, that even has 'Crystal' in its name.
There's speed boosts scattered throughout the map where health is.
Those speed boosts don't give him insane attack speed and mana regen.
Should have it everywhere on the map because it's the Crystal Scar, lol. (that's a joke, but still)
Wow, if this is a nerf they've definitely killed my favourite game mode.
